C

Clear() - Method in class DrawPanel
Clear method deletes all the shapes that were drawn by setting ShapeCounter to 0.

This method will draw the shape with the resulted values from the user
draw(Graphics) - Method in class MyShape
Abstract function which will draw the shape Every inherited class will has to execute this function in order to use it
DrawFrame - Class in <Unnamed>
This class draws the figure the user sees with all the GUI elements (JButton,JComboBox,JCheckBox,JLabel).
DrawFrame() - Constructor for class DrawFrame
DrawFrame - initializes GUI elements and adds events and labels it also creates a DrawPanel.
DrawPanel - Class in <Unnamed>
This class will take control on creating the shapes array including using the relevant constructors and the draw method This class will extends JPanel and using all the MyShape methods MyShape
DrawPanel(JFrame, JLabel) - Constructor for class DrawPanel
DrawPanel Constructor - initializes the frame and statusLabel that came from the DrawFrame DrawFrame class, it uses mouse coordinates to get info about it.

MyShape - Class in <Unnamed>
This abstract class inherits from 'java.lang.Object' and holds all the functions which will used by the other classes such as: MyLine,MyOval and MyRect.

U

Undo() - Method in class DrawPanel
public method that activated from DrawFrame class when the user click on Undo JButton, This method deletes the last shape that was drawn, (reduces ShapeCounter, and lets the garbage collector do the rest) redraws all the shapes excluding the pne you deleted
